p: In the current issue of the journal, Rashed et al. [ 5] investigated thyroid dysfunction in children with HCV infection receiving PegIFN plus ribavirin and showed that 28% of children (14 of 50) developed subclinical hypothyroidism. PegIFN-based therapies have various burdensome adverse reactions such as thyroid dysfunction. The incidence of thyroid dysfunction increases to 15%â€“40% with IFN use [ 6]. The types of thyroid dysfunction were subclinical hypothyroidism (50.7%), and so on such as hypo-, hyper-, and subclinical hyperthyroidism and thyroiditis [ 7].
